51815.「オッケー。女神の蒼銀石は\n 無事 光の河に捧げられたようだな。:
O-kay! That Silver Goddess Gem was safely
offered to the River of Light!

51816.「それじゃ 次は 女神に祈るとしよう。\n チカラを抜き リラックスしてくれ。:
Okay, now it's time to pray to the Goddess.
Relax, and let your power flow.

51818.どこからともなく 声が 聞こえてくる。: A voice can be heard echoing from afar...

51820.<center>魔瘴がもたらす 悪しきチカラは\nアストルティアに住む 生あるも:
The wicked power of the demon miasma
transformed the living beings of Astoltia
into monsters.

51821.<center>楽園の時代は 終わりを告げ\n多くの子らが その手に武器を取り\:
The era of peace has ended, and many of my
children take up arms in the battle against
the many monsters.

51822.<center>六聖陣は この 新たなチカラに望みを託し\n立ち上がりし者たちの:
The Six Saints have placed hope in this new power, and have decided to take upon the role of releasing the hidden potential of
those willing to fight.

51823.<center>ここに 魔瘴に侵されし者と\nチカラを解放され 使命に目覚めし者:
And here begins a new era of the holy war
between those tainted by miasma and those
who awaken to a new power.
